title: rBnb
description:
A web application that allows individuals to rent a house for a set period of time, as well as to list their own property, much like Airbnb.

This project also includes an instant messaging system made with Firebase.

title: Psycaptr
description:
A project that aims to connect doctors with their patients and to present the results of psycho-technical tests in the form of graphs.

This project also includes an admin dashboard to manage doctors and patients.

title: Mr Jack Pocket
description: A two-player board game where one player plays the detective Sherlock Holmes while the other player plays the criminal Mr Jack.

title: Space in ISEP
description: A Space Invador clone that I made using Java and Java Fx. It was my first coding project and it introduced me to Object-Oriented Programming.
